desc: Do you love cake? So do we. Butter Believe It, a London-based bakery, delivers the tastiest cakes and cookies straight to your door.

layout.text: I’m obsessed with baking. I mean obsessed. There’s not a day that goes by where I’m not coming up with flavours and design ideas for Butter Believe It. The bottom line is: We make the best desserts you’ll ever have, I’m not bragging, scroll down for the reviews!
